attributes.action: CHANGES IN THE `POLICE STATION` SYSTEM ON `CAUTIONS` ECT AS TODAYS SYSTEM HAS MANY ERRORS AGAINST A PERSON.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT TO SEE `CHANGES` AT THE POLICE STATION ON TAKING A `CAUTION` ECT AS THE SYSTEM NOW CAN BE ABUSED BY THE POLICE AND BE VERY BIAS TOWARDS A PERSON.

FIRST THE `LEGAL ADVISER` OR `SOLICITOR` `MUST` MAKE SURE THE POLICE FOLLOW THERE PROCEDURES WHICH IS NOT DONE AT THIS TIME, BOTH `MUST` REMAIN WITH THAT PERSON TO MAKE SURE EVERYTHING IS DONE IS CORRECT INCLUDING THE SIGNING OF ANY PAPERWORK BEFORE THEY LEAVE, ON A `CAUTION` TO MAKE SURE `ALL` IMPLICATIONS ARE MADE KNOWN TO THAT PERSON WHICH IS NOT THE CASE TODAY, THEY GET PAID BY THE STATE AND SHOULD DO THIS EVERYTIME AS AFTER THEY LEAVE, THAT PERSON IS AT THE MERCY OF POOR POLICE OFFICERS WHO COULD SET THEM UP TO GET A CASE.

EVERYTHING ON THE PAPERS TO BE SIGNED MUST BE SHOWN OR TOLD TO THAT PERSON SO THEY UNDERSTAND WHAT THEY ARE SIGNING, AGAIN THIS DOES NOT HAPPEN AND IS WRONG IN LAW AS THE POLICE CAN DO AS THEY WISH, PLUG THE LOOPHOLES PLEASE ON THESE MATTERS.
